rooms.description: North-facing entrance with a spacious foyer designed to welcome energy and positivity per Vastu principles. The design incorporates ample natural lighting through floor-to-ceiling windows.
Spacious living room featuring large, floor-to-ceiling windows that let in abundant natural light, ensuring a bright and airy atmosphere.
Well-proportioned dining area with open space allowing for interaction during meals. Designed to integrate seamlessly with the living area.
Modern kitchen layout optimized for workflow, with dedicated zones for preparation and cooking. Includes ample storage and modern appliances.
Multi-use space that can be adapted as a guest room or workspace, ensuring flexibility in usage.
A dedicated library area featuring built-in shelves and comfortable seating. Located in an area with north-facing windows to invite positive energy.

openings.description: Access point for a two-car garage, located conveniently on the ground floor ensuring ease of access.
North-facing main entrance door that aligns with Vastu principles, designed to welcome positive energy into the home.
